2.「しかし 悪い予感が 的中したのでアール……。| こんなにも早く ヤツが現れると: But my bad premonition was right on the money|and Aru... he didn't expect him to show up so|soon.

4.「……ふむ。ホッツィ親方が| この辺りで 魔物に襲われたから| その調査に来たの: Hmmm...hmmm. Boss Hottsi was attacked by a|monster around here, so we came to|investigate.

5.「……ホッツィ親方を襲ったのは| あの魔物に まちがいないだろうね。| ボクらも: I'm sure it was that monster that attacked|Boss Hottsi. We came here after him.

7.「あそこで ぬけがらのように倒れてる旅人は| その光線を くらっちゃったんだね…: The traveler lying there like a dead fish must|have been exposed to that ray... poor guy...

8.「……ビュブロスは モガリム街道に向かった。| このまま 放っておけば ヤツは|: Byblos headed for Mogarim Highway. If left|unchecked, he will attack the Town of Agrani|in search of souls in great numbers.

9.「……だが そうはさせん。| ヤツは わしと この杖が なんとかする。| ホッツ: But I won't let that happen. I and my staff|will take care of him. Tell Hottsi not to|worry.

10.「それでは また会おう。: Well then, I'll see you again.

11.「ルナナ！ お前みたいな はねっ返りが| 今さら アグラニに 何しにきやがった！: Lunana!　What's a rebellious little bitch like|you doing in Agrani after all these years?

12.「なんですって……！？| 誰のおかげで この町が再興したと思ってんの？| 全部: What the hell...! Who do you think is|responsible for the revival of this town? It's|all thanks to me!

14.「今日は それに対する 礼状を書いてもらうわ。| アグラニを救った英雄！ とでも:
Today, I'm going to ask you to write a thank-|you note for that. The hero who saved|Agrani!　I'm sure the world will naturally look|
|at me with a title like "Hero who saved|Agrani!

15.「か～っ！ なに言ってやがる！| お前の くだらん野望に 振りまわされて| オレ: Ka~!　What are you talking about? We've all|suffered so much because of your stupid|ambitions!

16.「お前の亡くなった親父さん…… ホルタ神父は| 本当に アグラニに尽くした 人格: Your late father... Father Holta was a man of|character who was truly devoted to Agrani. And|you, his daughter...

17.「うるさい！ 父さんは 関係ないでしょ！| あたしは この世界で のし上がるため: Shut up!　You're not my problem! I will do|whatever it takes to get ahead in this|world!　That's how I do it!

18.「ふん。お前には 何を言ってもムダだな。| オレは 礼状なんか書かねえぞ。| さ: Hmm. Nothing I can say will make sense to you.|I'm not writing you a thank-you note. Get the|hell out of here!

20.「おっと すまねえ！ 来てくれてたのか。| ご苦労だったな。さあ こっちに来て|: Oops, sorry!　I didn't know you were here.|Thanks for your hard work. Come on, let's hear|all about it.

21.「……ほう。オレが襲われた場所に| 賢者ブロッゲンさまが 現れたってのか。| そ: Oh... Sage Broggen appeared at the place where|I was attacked? That's a coincidence. So what|happened?

22.「……なっ なんだと！？| オレを襲った魔物は 魂を吸い取る| 恐ろしい魔獣だっ: What? The monster that attacked me was a|terrifying soul-sucking hexenbiest?

23.「しかも その魔獣ビュブロスって野郎は| アグラニを 襲うつもりでいただと……？: And this Magical Beast Byblos was planning to|attack Agrani...? This is crazy...

24.「ま…まあ あの賢者ブロッゲンさまが| なんとかしてくれるってえなら 安心か……: Well...if that Sage Broggen is going to take|care of it, I guess I can rest easy...that's|the best thing that could have happened to me.

25.「よし！ ご苦労だったな。| オレを襲った魔物の件は よ～くわかったぜ。| さあ: All right!　Thanks for your help. I understand|the monster that attacked me. Now, here's your|reward. Take it.

26.「あなた どこかで会ったかしら？| まあ もし そうだとしても| あたしは いっ: Do I know you from somewhere? Well, if I did,|I don't remember it at all.

27.「でも インパクトに欠ける 顔に似合わず| ずいぶんと 面白いネタを持ってるのね: But for someone with a face that lacks impact,|you sure have a lot of interesting material.|I'm interested in you.

28.「謎の魔獣に 賢者ブロッゲン……。| その話 今度 ゆっくり| 聞かせてもらうわ: Mysterious Hexenbiests and Sage Broggen...|we'll have to hear all about it sometime...

29.「……で どうだったい？| オレを襲った魔物の正体 わかったか？: So... how'd it go? Did you find out what kind|of monster attacked me?

30.<pc>は ホッツィ親方に|ガタラ原野での出来事を 話した。: <pc> told Boss Hottsi what happened|in the Gatara Fields.

31.「危ないところだったね。| あの光線に さわったら最後……。| あそこの旅人みた: That was a close call. If I had touched that|beam of light, I would have ended up like that|traveler over there.
